attributes.action: make House surveys the responsibility of the home seller.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are many financial factors currently preventing first time buyers getting on the housing ladder,one of which is getting a property surveyed.
i propose that it should be the person selling the property who should assure that it is in a specified condition and not a potential buyer to find this out, as it would be buying an every day product thus reducing costs for 1st time buyers and preventing duplicate surveys on properties.
